profileAlternative.name: Lori Haskell
profileAlternative.headline: Director of Sales at Loews Kansas City Hotel
profileAlternative.summary:
A seasoned hotel sales professional with solid experience in sales management, marketing and leadership with a 347 room hotel with over 21,000 sq ft of space. Hotel management experience with Hilton, Holiday Inn and Ramada hotels. A creative problem solver with the ability to lead a team to drive revenue growth and exceed goals.

Extensive knowledge in planning and executing sales and marketing plans and creating an annual budget. Creative thinker who will recognize and dive in to market trends to uncover potential revenue facets. Open minded manager with highly developed negotiation skills that has created a large client following. Able to develop and motivate a sales team to achieve budgeted revenue goals.

positions.title: Director of Sales
positions.description: Pre-Selling the new Loews Kansas City Hotel located downtown, adjacent to the Kansas City Convention Center which is due to open Spring 2020. Hiring a professional sales team which will target market segments to ensure the success of the hotel.

positions.title: Hilton Kansas City Airport
positions.description: Sales Manager and promoted to Director of Sales within four years.

positions.title:
Title
Sales Manager / Director of Sales
positions.description: Sales Manager and promoted to Director of Sales within four years.

positions.title: Membership Director
positions.description: Sold memberships to a private golf club that was new to the area.

educations.title: Platte Jr. College
educations.degree: Tourism and Travel Services Marketing Operations
educations.fieldofstudy: Tourism and Travel Services Marketing Operations

given.text:
I had the pleasure of working under Lori at the Hilton Kansas City Airport in the Catering department. I consider Lori one of my mentors for both sales and the hotel business. I have always appreciated her enthusiasm, client interactions and the amazing way she leads her team. I have utilized many of the ideas and qualities which Lori had taught me in my own sales direction with great success. I would gladly work under Lori again and I have nothing but respect for her and her accomplishments.
…
See more

received.text: Katy did a great job during her year of service at our Hilton.  She always arrived to work on time and completed her daily duties without any prompting.  Katy was very quick to learn her job and was always seeking ways to improve or learn additional duties.  I would recommend her for any position because she has the desire to do her job well and interacts wonderfully with clients or guests.

During Phil's tenure as a catering manager for our Hilton, he was very focused on achieving his goals.  His main objective was to increase his bookings over any previous manager is this particular position....and he did!  Any task given to him was completed on time and above standard.  He was a great asset to our team and we were sorry to see him move on.
